snippet: A college student who went on a stabbing attack Tuesday at Lone Star College told investigators that he fantasized about cutting off people’s faces and wearing them as masks.
abstract: College student Dylan Quick, who went on stabbing attack at Houston-area campus of Lone Star College, tells investigators that he fantasized about cutting off people’s faces and wearing them as masks.
lead_paragraph: A college student who went on a stabbing attack Tuesday at Lone Star College told investigators that he fantasized about cutting off people’s faces and wearing them as masks.

headline.main: Texas: Fantasies of Stabbing Suspect Described
headline.print_headline: Texas: Fantasies of Stabbing Suspect Described
